text: this feeling is echoed throughout brockville as well.   have you ever felt like this? would you want the people you love to feel like this?? are you really okay with so many people in ontario feeling like this?? i’m not...

today has been the perfect first day after finishing college that i could have had! to all of you who have held me up over these past 2 years thank you ! happy420 classof2020 doneby40 gratefulaf

that was about four years ago now, i don’t know for sure because i wasn’t planning it and never new my last hit was going to be my last. i have dabbled with opioids a few times, but not lately. now when i feel that op itch i eat a bunch of oil, safely knock myself out & feel

and then one day i realized that i hadn’t done any opioids in weeks. not because i tried to stop but because i didn’t need to anymore, cannabis not only gave me my health back but stopped that desperation i had to change the way i felt.

after a little bit of no crack i realized that my heroin use, while still a daily grind, was starting to decrease. again, i had no intentions of quitting it just happened. my use just slowed down until it wasn’t everyday, then it was just the bad days and then cheque days...

then something weird happened and for some reason i stopped using crack everyday. i wasn’t trying to cut back i just...did. my partner continued to use it so it was always there, but for some reason i didn’t want it anymore!

that plant did what none of their pills could do and i finally found some relief! i was so impressed that i instantly learned how to ingest it and started to do so on the daily. the more i took it the better i got! it was amazing!

i went to different specialists, took all sorts of tests, i even had my gallbladder taken out, which actually made it worse. finally, my methadone doc at the time suggests i try cannabis for the nausea and vomiting. and you know what? it worked!
got to the point where every toke or smash would end with me vomiting into (hopefully) a plastic bag or bucket that i just kept around for the next one. ‘twas disgusting to say the least!

about 4 years into my methadone use i started to get sick to my stomach...like violently vomiting to point that i would come to with a broken tooth after smashing my face off the porcelain. crack use was always a trigger with it, but that didn’t matter to me.

happy 4/20 everybody!! this year i’d like to share how cannabis helped me quit using crack and heroin, at a point in my life when i had given up trying to get sober because i hated the shame and guilt i felt each time. so instead i came to terms with being a chronic relapser.

homeless in brockville or know someone who is??? we finally have a place for you to go!! call for a referral: (613) 342-3840 ext 2129 during the day, between 4-10 pm call (613) 802-3505 this is a small step but a huge move in this city. so happy to see it has finally opened!

while i’m grateful for the torch-in fact it’s amazing-the discrimination she faced in that store was completely inappropriate. was it because she’s indigenous? because people can use it to do drugs?? because she wasn’t dressed the same (she got swag and game!)?? either way-not ok

the trampoline finally made its appearance so they were ready to leave. the same employee that gave her the torch and then followed her around store, went to the cashier and whispered what i can only assume were sweet nothings in her ear before pointing directly at my partner.

my partner explained this to the staff but she was adamant that anything kept behind glass needed to be payed for immediately. when she asked why she was allowed to keep the wood burner the staff member reluctantly put it in the cart for her, then she followed them around.

sweetly decided to get it for me. she found another employee & asked for the torch. this lady got it for her but told her that she had to come to the front and pay for it now. as my partner & friends were still waiting for the trampoline they were still shopping as they waited.

my partner went to  with friends that were buying a trampoline today. she wanted the leather/wood burner that’s on sale. a staff got it from behind the glass and gave it to her. she noticed a torch that was also on sale and, since i’m an avid dabber, she ever so
